column4: Hai! I love ubuntu and all, however how do I configure dual monitors with an nvidia graphics? (is there any way with out touching xorg.conf?)
nvidia-settings (you might have to add the package first)
btw when you start playing fullscreen games like urban terror you will learn to hate twinview ;)
Still using windows for games. I play TF2 and WC3, they never feel right in linux under wine.
